channel.title: Team on Prophet AI
channel.description: Recent content in Team on Prophet AI

item.title: Themis Sapsis, Ph.D.
item.description: Dr. Sapsis is a Professor of Mechanical and Ocean Engineering at MIT. His expertise lies at the interface of nonlinear dynamical systems, probabilistic modeling, and data-driven methods. He has received numerous awards for his work, including the Alfred P. Sloan Foundation Award and the Bodossaki Award on Basic Sciences: Mathematics. Dr. Sapsis holds a Ph.D. in Mechanical Engineering from MIT.

item.title: Ethan Pickering, Ph.D.
item.description: Dr. Pickering is an AI Genetic Optimization Manager at Bayer Crop Sciences where he is developing new technology for AI-assisted phenotypic discovery. Prior to joining Bayer, he worked on combining deep neural networks with optimal sampling techniques to efficiently perform experimental design. Dr. Pickering holds a Ph.D. in Mechanical Engineering from Caltech.

item.title: Antoine Blanchard, Ph.D.
item.description: Dr. Blanchard is an AI Research Manager at Verisk Extreme Event Solutions where he is building the next generation of AI models for climate risk. He has a wealth of experience in machine learning and computational science, and has previously developed novel algorithms for accelerating the design and optimization of expensive experiments. Dr. Blanchard holds a Ph.D. in Aerospace Engineering from UIUC.
